params._yax: The address of the YAX token

params._insuranceFee: The value for the insurance fee

params._insurancePool: The address of the insurance pool

params._insurancePoolFee: The value for the insurance pool fee

params._stakingPool: The address of the staking pool

params._stakingPoolShareFee: The value for the staking pool fee

setTreasuryBalance(uint256).details: Strategies will read this value to determine whether or not to give the treasury the treasuryFee

params._treasuryBalance: The maximum balance of the treasury

params._treasuryFee: The value for the treasury fee

params._withdrawalProtectionFee: The value for the withdrawal protection fee

params._yax: The address of the YAX token

getHarvestFeeInfo().notice: Returns a tuple of:     YAX token,     Staking pool address,     Staking pool share fee,     Treasury address,     Checks the balance of the treasury and returns the treasury fee         if below the treasuryBalance, or 0 if above

governanceRecoverUnsupported(address,uin.notice: Allows governance to pull tokens out of this contract (it should never hold tokens)

insuranceFee().notice: The following fees are all mutable.  They are updated by governance (community vote).

setControllerStatus(address,bool).notice: Sets the status for a controller

setStakingPoolShareFee(uint256).notice: Sets the staking pool share fee

setVaultStatus(address,bool).notice: Sets the status for a vault

userdoc.notice: This contract serves as the central point for governance-voted variables. Fees and permissioned addresses are stored and referenced in this contract only.
